title: Beautiful 3 Story Townhome in Magnolia-Queen Anne!
posting_body: Spacious and newly updated 3 story Townhome with high-end finishes in Magnolia-Queen Anne.
Home features 3 bedrooms - each with their own private bath, 1750 sq ft. Stainless Steel appliances and slab granite countertops.
Main floor features the living room, dining room and kitchen.
5 Piece Master Suite upstairs with vaulted ceilings, private bath, huge walk in closet & balcony with views.
Ground floor has 3rd bedroom & bath.
1 covered parking space in detached carport.
This lovely home is located in the desirable Magnolia neighborhood at 3611  22nd Ave West, #A, Seattle, 98199.
Driving Directions:
From 15th Ave W. head West on Dravus.
Turn right on 22nd
Ave W. Home is on the left hand side.
Please make sure you watch for posted address 3611-A on the front wall of the house.
Lease Terms:
This lovely home is available for lease beginning August 1 for $3800 per month.
No smoking.
No Pets.
First month’s rent & $3,800 security deposit due up front.
12 month lease.
$44 lease application fee.
Tenant responsible for all utilities & Lawn care.
Application requirements:
- positive credit history (min score 700)
- no history of property management collections
- no history of evictions (unlawful detainers)
- must have proof of employment
-landlord cannot re-use applications or credit reports
-tenant will be required to have a landscape contract
For more information text Melissa at
show contact info
